elements.text: Shot of AGENT SAM PATRICK CARTER (20’s, ex-military) and SPECIAL AGENT ATLAS111 (30s, perfect, more designed than born). Sam in focus smoking. Atlas foreground in shadow.
We focus on Atlas. He places a glowing tab on his tongue...

scenes.slugline: ExT. backyard - BASE REALITY - day - memory

elements.text: ExT. backyard - BASE REALITY - day - memory
A young ELLA GRAY (6, carefree) runs through a yard holding a dandelion. A home-video. A memory.

scenes.slugline: Ext. CLIFFSIDE ocean view - Silk Road - sunset

elements.text: Ext. CLIFFSIDE ocean view - Silk Road - sunset
Ella (18) stands before a glowing ocean and a golden sky. She wears a black hoodie. Hood up. She holds the dandelion from the memory. Blows it free. Drops the stem.
You think God can see us in here?
The world dissolves — replaced by a glowing grid stretching to the horizon. A blueprint of something not yet built.

scenes.slugline: Int. Sam'S APARTMENT - base reality - night

elements.text: Int. Sam'S APARTMENT - base reality - night
Over the shoulder shot of SAM’S INFANT SON. Sam is holding him. He has thin scars on his scalp.
There’s a camera in every head in the country!

scenes.slugline: Int.  CBAU  briefing room - base REALITY – night

elements.text: Int.  CBAU  briefing room - base REALITY – night
SENATOR LEWIS  WHITMORE  (50s, weary) paces beside a 3D rendering of LILA  WHITMORE , standing motionless. Eye’s white. Indistinguishable from the real girl.
So why can’t we find my daughter?!
Shot of FBI DIRECTOR ISAIAH SHAW (60s, deep-set eyes, coffee-stained teeth)...
Sam circles the table. A body lays still beneath a sheet.
Sam removes the sheet, revealing a corpse.
We’re over RICHARD HUGHES’s shoulder. Suddenly, Atlas (male) spawns in.

scenes.slugline: INT.  CBAU  CUBICLE ROOM – BASE REALITY – MORNING

elements.text: INT.  CBAU  CUBICLE ROOM – BASE REALITY – MORNING
Sam leans back. Takes a breath. A small ring of light flashes on his temple.
Shot of  PREYBOY . His wolf costume hangs off him in filthy tatters. His mask is matted and cracked. His left eye visible through a tear.
Atlas (male) at the center of frame in a long, shadowed corridor. At its end, a square of light, a window into a city of neon and silk.

scenes.slugline: int.  cbau  bRIEFING ROOM - basE REALITY - night

elements.text: int.  cbau  bRIEFING ROOM - basE REALITY - night
He turns. We cut to Sam. Sat at the edge of the table.

scenes.slugline: Ext. dirt field - base reaLITY - day

elements.text: Ext. dirt field - base reaLITY - day
Sam walking in tactical gear holding his M4.

scenes.slugline: Int. InTERROGATION ROOM – base reality - NIGHT

elements.text: Int. InTERROGATION ROOM – base reality - NIGHT
Sam looms over Richard. Dog tags visible. He digs through his pocket.
Awarded the Medal of Valor by taking down the Schoolyard Stalker.
He places a signet ring on the table. Richard looks up.

scenes.slugline: Int.  CBAU  Hallway - base reality - day

elements.text: Int.  CBAU  Hallway - base reality - day
Sam and AGENT CAMILA CARVER walk the hallway...
The VR surface web’s all regulated. Silk Road isn’t. Same name and Tor backbone as the first dark-web market. Only difference... Now it’s got a body.
You’re a strong behavioral scientist. But in Base Reality. Behavior’s contained. In there...

scenes.slugline: int. Empty room - silk road - afternoon

elements.text: int. Empty room - silk road - afternoon
Over the shoulder shot of Atlas (male). We move from the left of Sam’s shoulder the the right.
While we’re behind Sam’s head. Atlas shifts. Same eyes. Same clothes.  But   a female face...
Atlas (female) wears a white silk robe. She walks a white silk path through the meadow.

scenes.slugline: Int.  cbau  hALLWAY - basE REALITY - conTINUOUS

elements.text: Int.  cbau  hALLWAY - basE REALITY - conTINUOUS
Camila stops at the end of the hall. Turns to Sam.
Atlas (male) stares into the distance. His blue eyes glow.
The primary on this is Special Agent Atlas One-Eleven.

scenes.slugline: Int. tactical room - Silk road – night

elements.text: Int. tactical room - Silk road – night
Atlas (female) works at a multi-monitor desktop setup. Three curved monitors on her desk. A dozen screens float in  AR  space around her.
Founder of the Cyber Behavioral Science Unit...

scenes.slugline: INT. the archive – Silk Road - NIGHT

elements.text: INT. the archive – Silk Road - NIGHT
Down shot of Atlas (male) cross-legged at the center of a rainbow ring of memory tabs. Their glow illuminates him.

scenes.slugline: INT.  CBAU  BRIEFING ROOM - base reality - night

elements.text: INT.  CBAU  BRIEFING ROOM - base reality - night
Atlas111? What kind of name is that? Where the hell is he?
Sam places a folder on the table between them.

scenes.slugline: Int. SwingeRS CLUB hallway - Silk Road - night

elements.text: Int. SwingeRS CLUB hallway - Silk Road - night
Smoke. Strobe lights. Bodies writhe. Wet with sweat. Hands reach for Atlas (male). He pushes through. Unfazed.

scenes.slugline: Ext. Grassy FIELD - silk ROAD - night

elements.text: Ext. Grassy FIELD - silk ROAD - night
Atlas (female) falls. Face covered in cuts. She slides her hand in her pocket. Removes  a full katana . Lunges off screen.
Gunshots in the distance. Sam aims his sniper. Atlas (female) wanders in the open.
Get down. They’re gonna see you.

scenes.slugline: Int.  cbAU  BRIEFING ROOM - base reality - night

elements.text: Int.  cbAU  BRIEFING ROOM - base reality - night
Camila paces by Lila’s skin. Standing motionless.
Last week, this mesh was identified...
Two girls emote on the stairs framing the runway. Lila walks the runway. Waves at Sam.
...at a skin-bazaar on Silk Road. We traced the node cluster...
Sam inspects a paper price tag attached as an earring.
JACK THE SHIPPER fiddles with his tattoo gun. He wears a plague doctor mask and a medical apron with just boxers beneath.
Lila enters an elevator. A man hustles in wearing a medical mask and sunglasses. The doors shut.
Leads the largest trafficking operation we’ve seen to date...
He catches up. Suffocates her with a chloroform cloth. She falls.
Jack looms over Ella in the wheelchair, holding a tattoo gun.
Some agents took to calling him
He presses the tattoo gun to her face. She shrieks.
The auction ends in 22 hours! How the fuck are we gonna find her?!

scenes.slugline: INT. TATTOO ROOM - silk road - night

elements.text: INT. TATTOO ROOM - silk road - night
Lila lunges for the edge of the cage.
You have to help please! Don’t let them-

scenes.slugline: Int. SwINGERS CLUB hallway - silk ROAD - night

elements.text: Int. SwINGERS CLUB hallway - silk ROAD - night
Atlas (male) stands at the center of a long hallway. Each panel on the walls glows a bright red. On the frame at the end of the hall, written in black marker across the top reads: Dr. Mind.
Atlas knocks. The hall falls dark.

scenes.slugline: Int. AbANDONED ANIMAL HOSPITAL - baSE REALITY – night

elements.text: Int. AbANDONED ANIMAL HOSPITAL - baSE REALITY – night
Sam turns on his flashlight. Six furry-suited bodies lie in heaps. Unconscious. Masks askew. Massive litter-boxes lay with the bodies. The floor covered with dog-food and feces.
Sam watches. One twitches.  It’s   PreyBoy.  He takes off running.
They run through the hall. Turn through a doorway.
Sam tackles the furry. Pins him.
No one walks the Silk Road and comes out unscathed.
Sam unleashes. Beating the furry to a pulp.
Atlas (male) stares into a broken mirror, holding himself up against the sink. He digs through his pocket. Frantic. Removes a blue sheet of memory tabs.
DAD lifts us in the air. The whole room is pink. We giggle. Staring down at him. He spins us around.
Atlas (male) tears at the packet. Sliding down the wall.
He peels off another tab. Takes it...
MOM wipes a cut on our knee. She kisses it.
It’ll be okay now. I promise.
Atlas (male) lays on the floor. He takes a deep breath. The good memories pinned to his chest.

scenes.slugline: Int. Sam'S BEDROOM - base REALITY – night

elements.text: Int. Sam'S BEDROOM - base REALITY – night
LAUREN (20’s, a tired young mother) holds her infant son.
And remember. You’re a dad now too...

scenes.slugline: Int. police cruiser - SILK ROAD - night

elements.text: Int. police cruiser - SILK ROAD - night
Sam and HOPE (early 20’s, blonde, synthetic-perfection) sit in the car. We pan to the front where  another Hope  walks the road. Stopping at the center  holding a   checkered flag .
Sam smirks. Grips the wheel. Hope waves the flag.
Hope waves the flag. Sam peels out.

scenes.slugline: EXT. Halo house - silk road - DAY

elements.text: EXT. Halo house - silk road - DAY
Hope’s arms are wrapped around Sam. She wears a wedding dress. Veil pulled back. She looks up at him. Seductive. Predatory.
I’m whatever you want me to be...
Shot of Sam’s hands. He twist his wedding ring behind her back.

scenes.slugline: Int. the aRCHIVE – Silk Road - night

elements.text: Int. the aRCHIVE – Silk Road - night
Atlas (male) collapses in Sam’s arms. Fracturing.

scenes.slugline: Int. Tattoo room - silk road - night

elements.text: Int. Tattoo room - silk road - night
Ella sits in the wheelchair in the basement room. The tattoos on her face read:  Flower Gurl. Little Silk.  She slices her thigh. Over and over.
Atlas (female) and Sam in the hospital hallway.
You want me to trust you? I don’t know shit about you! Who even are you?

scenes.slugline: Int. Sam’s bedroom - base reality - night

elements.text: Int. Sam’s bedroom - base reality - night
Sam on the floor. Sleepless. Lauren stands above him. Hope seduces, wrapping her arms around Lauren who’s blind to Hope’s presence.
It’s all in your head, Sammy.

elements.text: Int. TACTICAL ROOM - Silk road - NIGHT
Who the hell have we been hunting?

Ella sits in the wheelchair in the basement room. The tattoos on her face read:  Flower Gurl. Little Silk.  She slices her thigh. Over and over.
Atlas (female) and Sam in the hospital hallway.
You want me to trust you? I don’t know shit about you! Who even are you?
Int. Sam’s bedroom - base reality - night
Sam on the floor. Sleepless. Lauren stands above him. Hope seduces, wrapping her arms around Lauren who’s blind to Hope’s presence.
It’s all in your head, Sammy.
Int. TACTICAL ROOM - Silk road - NIGHT
Who the hell have we been hunting?
Int. Abandoned cps bUILDING - base reality - day
Sam is thrown to the ground by a SWAT officer. Face pinned. Screaming.
Sam stares through the glass. Fist clenched.
Sam wrestles Atlas (male) for the memory tabs.
Shot of Edmund Reed - cleft face - broken glasses, shrouded in shadow.
You let him wear the badge!!
Atlas (male) puts his hand on Sam’s shoulder. Leans in...
Shot of Sam. He looks up.
Why’d he choose to stay in Heaven?
Tokyo by way of dream logic. Alive. Impossible. Watching. Wide shot of the city. We move through it.
